mapper.sql:
t1.ORG_ID as org_id, t1.ORG_CODE as area_org_code, t1.ORG_NAME as area_org_name, nvl(sum(t2.acceptNum), 0) as accept_num, nvl(sum(t2.finishNum), 0) as finish_num, nvl(sum(t2.beforeFinishNum), 0) as before_finish_num,
nvl(sum(t2.instanceSuperviseGreenNum), 0) as instance_supervise_green_num, nvl(sum(t2.instanceSuperviseYelloNum), 0) as instance_supervise_yello_num, nvl(sum(t2.instanceSuperviseRedNum), 0) as instance_supervise_red_num,
nvl(sum(t2.specialSuperviseGreenNum), 0) as special_supervise_green_num, nvl(sum(t2.specialSuperviseYellowNum), 0) as special_supervise_yellow_num, nvl(sum(t2.specialSuperviseRedNum), 0) as special_supervise_red_num,
nvl(sum(t2.complainSuperviseYelloNum), 0) as complain_supervise_yello_num, nvl(sum(t2.complainSuperviseRedNum), 0) as complain_supervise_red_num,
nvl(sum(t2.consultSuperviseGreenNum), 0) as consult_supervise_green_num, nvl(sum(t2.consultSuperviseYelloNum), 0) as consult_supervise_yello_num, nvl(sum(t2.consultSuperviseRedNum), 0) as consult_supervise_red_num,
nvl(sum(t2.comNum), 0) as com_num, nvl(sum(t2.complainReplyNum), 0) as complain_reply_num, nvl(sum(t2.consultNum), 0) as consult_num, nvl(sum(t2.consultReplayNum), 0) as consult_replay_num, nvl(sum(t2.legalTimeSum), 0) as legal_time_sum, nvl(sum(t2.promiseTimeSum), 0) as promise_time_sum, nvl(sum(t2.timeUseSumLegal), 0) as time_use_sum_legal, nvl(sum(t2.timeUseSumPromise), 0) as time_use_sum_promise, nvl(sum(t2.acceptNumNew), 0) as accept_num_new
mapper.select:
select * from( select
from V_JC_TONGJI_ORG t1 left join (select
si.CITY_CODE as area_code,
si.COUNTY_CODE as area_code,
sum(si.ACCEPT_NUM) as acceptNum, sum(si.FINISH_NUM) as finishNum, sum(si.BEFORE_FINISH_NUM) as beforeFinishNum,
sum(si.instance_Supervise_Green_Num) as instanceSuperviseGreenNum, sum(si.INSTANCE_SUPERVISE_YELLO_NUM) as instanceSuperviseYelloNum, sum(si.INSTANCE_SUPERVISE_RED_NUM) as instanceSuperviseRedNum,
sum(si.special_Supervise_Green_Num) as specialSuperviseGreenNum, sum(si.special_Supervise_Yellow_Num) as specialSuperviseYellowNum, sum(si.special_Supervise_Red_Num) as specialSuperviseRedNum,
sum(si.COMPLAIN_SUPERVISE_YELLO_NUM) as complainSuperviseYelloNum, sum(si.COMPLAIN_SUPERVISE_RED_NUM) as complainSuperviseRedNum,
sum(si.consult_Supervise_Green_Num) as consultSuperviseGreenNum, sum(si.CONSULT_SUPERVISE_YELLO_NUM) as consultSuperviseYelloNum, sum(si.CONSULT_SUPERVISE_RED_NUM) as consultSuperviseRedNum,
sum(si.COMPLAIN_NUM) as comNum, sum(si.complain_reply_num) as complainReplyNum, sum(si.consult_num) as consultNum, sum(si.consult_replay_num) as consultReplayNum, sum(si.legal_time) as legalTimeSum, sum(si.promise_time) as promiseTimeSum, sum(si.time_use_legal) as timeUseSumLegal, sum(si.time_use_promise) as timeUseSumPromise, sum(si.accept_num_new) as acceptNumNew from ${table} si where 1 = 1
and si.is_investment_supervision = #{isInvestmentSupervision,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and si.is_investment_supervision <> '1'
and si.NOW_DATE >= #{beginDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and si.NOW_DATE <= #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
group by CITY_CODE) t2 on t1.CITY_CODE = t2.area_code
group by COUNTY_CODE) t2 on t1.COUNTY_CODE = t2.area_code
where 1 = 1 and t1.p_id = #{pId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by t1.ORG_ID,t1.ORG_NAME, t1.ORG_CODE, t1.ORDER_NUM order by t1.ORDER_NUM )
mapper.sql: t1.ORG_ID as org_id, t1.ORG_CODE as area_org_code, t1.ORG_NAME as area_org_name, nvl(sum(t2.acceptNum), 0) as accept_num, nvl(sum(t2.finishNum), 0) as finish_num, nvl(sum(t2.beforeFinishNum), 0) as before_finish_num, nvl(sum(t2.instanceSuperviseGreenNum), 0) as instance_supervise_green_num, nvl(sum(t2.instanceSuperviseYelloNum), 0) as instance_supervise_yello_num, nvl(sum(t2.instanceSuperviseRedNum), 0) as instance_supervise_red_num, nvl(sum(t2.instanceCancelYellowNum), 0) as instance_cancel_yellow_num, nvl(sum(t2.instanceCancelRedNum), 0) as instance_cancel_red_num, nvl(sum(t2.complainSuperviseYelloNum), 0) as complain_supervise_yello_num, nvl(sum(t2.complainSuperviseRedNum), 0) as complain_supervise_red_num, nvl(sum(t2.consultSuperviseYelloNum), 0) as consult_supervise_yello_num, nvl(sum(t2.consultSuperviseRedNum), 0) as consult_supervise_red_num, nvl(sum(t2.comNum), 0) as com_num, nvl(sum(t2.complainReplyNum), 0) as complain_reply_num, nvl(sum(t2.consultNum), 0) as consult_num, nvl(sum(t2.consultReplayNum), 0) as consult_replay_num, nvl(sum(t2.legalTimeSum), 0) as legal_time_sum, nvl(sum(t2.promiseTimeSum), 0) as promise_time_sum, nvl(sum(t2.timeUseSumLegal), 0) as time_use_sum_legal, nvl(sum(t2.timeUseSumPromise), 0) as time_use_sum_promise, nvl(sum(t2.acceptNumNew), 0) as accept_num_new
mapper.select:
select t1.ORG_ID as org_id, t1.ORG_CODE as areaOrgCode, t1.ORG_NAME as areaOrgName, nvl(t2.acceptNum, 0) as acceptNum, nvl(t2.finishNum,0) as finishNum, nvl(t2.beforeFinishNum, 0) as beforeFinishNum, nvl(t2.instanceSuperviseYelloNum, 0) as instanceSuperviseYelloNum, nvl(t2.instanceSuperviseRedNum, 0) as instanceSuperviseRedNum, nvl(t2.complainSuperviseYelloNum, 0) as complainSuperviseYelloNum, nvl(t2.complainSuperviseRedNum, 0) as complainSuperviseRedNum, nvl(t2.consultSuperviseYelloNum, 0) as consultSuperviseYelloNum, nvl(t2.consultSuperviseRedNum, 0) as consultSuperviseRedNum, nvl(t2.superviseYelloNum, 0) as superviseYelloNum, nvl(t2.superviseRedNum, 0) as superviseRedNum, nvl(t2.comNum, 0) as comNum, nvl(t2.complainReplyNum, 0) as complainReplyNum, nvl(t2.consultNum, 0) as consultNum, nvl(t2.consultReplayNum, 0) as consultReplayNum, nvl(t2.legalTimeSum, 0) as legal_time_sum, nvl(t2.promiseTimeSum, 0) as promise_time_sum, nvl(t2.timeUseSumLegal, 0) as time_use_sum_legal, nvl(t2.timeUseSumPromise, 0) as time_use_sum_promise from V_JC_TONGJI_ORG t1 left join (select
si.province_code as area_code,
si.city_code as area_code,
si.county_code as area_code,
si.org_id as area_code,
si.county_code as area_code,
sum(si.ACCEPT_NUM) as acceptNum, sum(si.FINISH_NUM) as finishNum, sum(si.BEFORE_FINISH_NUM) as beforeFinishNum, sum(si.INSTANCE_SUPERVISE_YELLO_NUM) as instanceSuperviseYelloNum, sum(si.INSTANCE_SUPERVISE_RED_NUM) as instanceSuperviseRedNum, sum(si.COMPLAIN_SUPERVISE_YELLO_NUM) as complainSuperviseYelloNum, sum(si.COMPLAIN_SUPERVISE_RED_NUM) as complainSuperviseRedNum, sum(si.CONSULT_SUPERVISE_YELLO_NUM) as consultSuperviseYelloNum, sum(si.CONSULT_SUPERVISE_RED_NUM) as consultSuperviseRedNum, sum(si.supervise_yello_num) as superviseYelloNum, sum(si.supervise_red_num) as superviseRedNum, sum(si.COMPLAIN_NUM) as comNum, sum(si.complain_reply_num) as complainReplyNum, sum(si.consult_num) as consultNum, sum(si.consult_replay_num) as consultReplayNum, sum(si.legal_time) as legalTimeSum, sum(si.promise_time) as promiseTimeSum, sum(si.time_use_legal) as timeUseSumLegal, sum(si.time_use_promise) as timeUseSumPromise from ${table} si where 1 = 1
and si.is_investment_supervision = #{isInvestmentSupervision,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and si.is_investment_supervision <> '1'
and si.city_code <> '439900000000'
and si.NOW_DATE >= #{beginDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and si.NOW_DATE <= #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
group by si.province_code) t2 on t1.province_code = t2.area_code
group by si.city_code) t2 on t1.city_code = t2.area_code
group by si.county_code) t2 on t1.county_code = t2.area_code
group by si.org_id) t2 on t1.org_id = t2.area_code
group by si.county_code) t2 on t1.county_code = t2.area_code
where 1 = 1 and t1.org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
from V_JC_TONGJI_ORG t1 left join (select
si.CITY_CODE as area_code,
si.COUNTY_CODE as area_code,

and si.is_investment_supervision <> '1'

mapper.sql:
(select o.ORG_ID, o.ORG_CODE, o.ORG_NAME ORG_SHOW_NAME, o.PROVINCE_CODE, o.CITY_CODE, o.County_CODE, o.STREET_CODE, o.ORG_LEVEL, b.xzxksxs, b.xzjlsxs, b.xzcjsxs, b.xzjcsxs, b.xzgfsxs, b.xzqzsxs, b.xzqrsxs, b.xzcfsxs, b.xzzssxs, b.qtxzqlsxs, b.ggfwsxs,
b.xzxksjs, b.xzjlsjs, b.xzcjsjs, b.xzjcsjs, b.xzgfsjs, b.xzqzsjs, b.xzqrsjs, b.xzcfsjs, b.xzzssjs, b.qtxzqlsjs, b.ggfwsjs,
b.xzxk_finish_num, b.xzjl_finish_num, b.xzcj_finish_num, b.xzjc_finish_num, b.xzgf_finish_num, b.xzqz_finish_num, b.xzqr_finish_num, b.xzcf_finish_num, b.xzzs_finish_num, b.qtxzql_finish_num, b.ggfw_finish_num from V_TD_SM_ORGANIZATION1 o, (select org_id, sum(decode(app_code, 01, approvecount, 0)) xzxksxs, sum(decode(app_code, 08, approvecount, 0)) xzjlsxs, sum(decode(app_code, 09, approvecount, 0)) xzcjsxs, sum(decode(app_code, 06, approvecount, 0)) xzjcsxs, sum(decode(app_code, 05, approvecount, 0)) xzgfsxs, sum(decode(app_code, 03, approvecount, 0)) xzqzsxs, sum(decode(app_code, 07, approvecount, 0)) xzqrsxs, sum(decode(app_code, 02, approvecount, 0)) xzcfsxs, sum(decode(app_code, 04, approvecount, 0)) xzzssxs, sum(decode(app_code, 10, approvecount, 0)) qtxzqlsxs, sum(decode(app_code, 11, approvecount, 0)) ggfwsxs,
sum(xzxk_num) xzxksjs, sum(xzjl_num) xzjlsjs, sum(xzcj_num) xzcjsjs, sum(xzjc_num) xzjcsjs, sum(xzgf_num) xzgfsjs, sum(xzqz_num) xzqzsjs, sum(xzqr_num) xzqrsjs, sum(xzcf_num) xzcfsjs, sum(xzzs_num) xzzssjs, sum(qtxzql_num) qtxzqlsjs, sum(ggfw_num) ggfwsjs,
sum(xzxk_finish_num) xzxk_finish_num, sum(xzjl_finish_num) xzjl_finish_num, sum(xzcj_finish_num) xzcj_finish_num, sum(xzjc_finish_num) xzjc_finish_num, sum(xzgf_finish_num) xzgf_finish_num, sum(xzqz_finish_num) xzqz_finish_num, sum(xzqr_finish_num) xzqr_finish_num, sum(xzcf_finish_num) xzcf_finish_num, sum(xzzs_finish_num) xzzs_finish_num, sum(qtxzql_finish_num) qtxzql_finish_num, sum(ggfw_finish_num) ggfw_finish_num from (select xm.org_id org_id, xm.type_code app_code, count(*) approvecount, 0 as xzxk_num, 0 as xzjl_num, 0 as xzcj_num, 0 as xzjc_num, 0 as xzgf_num, 0 as xzqz_num, 0 as xzqr_num, 0 as xzcf_num, 0 as xzzs_num, 0 as qtxzql_num, 0 as ggfw_num,
0 as xzxk_finish_num, 0 as xzjl_finish_num, 0 as xzcj_finish_num, 0 as xzjc_finish_num, 0 as xzgf_finish_num, 0 as xzqz_finish_num, 0 as xzqr_finish_num, 0 as xzcf_finish_num, 0 as xzzs_finish_num, 0 as qtxzql_finish_num, 0 as ggfw_finish_num from ta_spxm xm where not exists (select 1 from ta_spxm sp where sp.parent_code = xm.rights_code) group by xm.org_id, xm.type_code
UNION ALL
select i.org_id org_id, null app_code, 0 approvecount, sum(xzxke_num) xzxk_num, sum(xzjl_num) xzjl_num, sum(xzcj_num) xzcj_num, sum(xzjc_num) xzjc_num, sum(xzgf_num) xzgf_num, sum(xzqz_num) xzqz_num, sum(xzqr_num) xzqr_num, sum(xzcf_num) xzcf_num, sum(xzzs_num) xzzs_num, sum(qtxzql_num) qtxzql_num, sum(ggfw_num) ggfw_num,
sum(xzxke_finish_num) xzxk_finish_num, sum(xzjl_finish_num) xzjl_finish_num, sum(xzcj_finish_num) xzcj_finish_num, sum(xzjc_finish_num) xzjc_finish_num, sum(xzgf_finish_num) xzgf_finish_num, sum(xzqz_finish_num) xzqz_finish_num, sum(xzqr_finish_num) xzqr_finish_num, sum(xzcf_finish_num) xzcf_finish_num, sum(xzzs_finish_num) xzzs_finish_num, sum(qtxzql_finish_num) qtxzql_finish_num, sum(ggfw_finish_num) ggfw_finish_num from ${table} i where 1 = 1
and i.is_investment_supervision = #{isInvestmentSupervision,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and i.is_investment_supervision <> '1'
and i.NOW_DATE >= #{beginDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and i.NOW_DATE <= #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
group by i.org_id) a group by a.org_id) b where o.ORG_ID = b.org_id) s

da.org_id org_id, da.org_name area_org_name, da.org_code area_org_code, nvl(aa.xzxksxs, '0') xzxksxs, nvl(aa.xzjlsxs, '0') xzjlsxs, nvl(aa.xzcjsxs, '0') xzcjsxs,
'0' xzjcsxs, nvl(aa.xzgfsxs, '0') xzgfsxs,
'0' xzqzsxs, nvl(aa.xzqrsxs, '0') xzqrsxs,
'0' xzcfsxs,
'0' xzzssxs, nvl(aa.qtxzqlsxs, '0') qtxzqlsxs, nvl(aa.ggfwsxs, '0') ggfwsxs,
nvl(aa.xzxksjs, '0') xzxksjs, nvl(aa.xzjlsjs, '0') xzjlsjs, nvl(aa.xzcjsjs, '0') xzcjsjs,

sum(s.xzxksxs) xzxksxs, sum(s.xzjlsxs) xzjlsxs, sum(s.xzcjsxs) xzcjsxs, sum(s.xzjcsxs) xzjcsxs, sum(s.xzgfsxs) xzgfsxs, sum(s.xzqzsxs) xzqzsxs, sum(s.xzqrsxs) xzqrsxs, sum(s.xzcfsxs) xzcfsxs, sum(s.xzzssxs) xzzssxs, sum(s.qtxzqlsxs) qtxzqlsxs, sum(s.ggfwsxs) ggfwsxs,

sum(s.xzxk_finish_num) xzxkbjs, sum(s.xzjl_finish_num) xzjlbjs, sum(s.xzcj_finish_num) xzcjbjs, sum(s.xzjc_finish_num) xzjcbjs, sum(s.xzgf_finish_num) xzgfbjs, sum(s.xzqz_finish_num) xzqzbjs, sum(s.xzqr_finish_num) xzqrbjs, sum(s.xzcf_finish_num) xzcfbjs, sum(s.xzzs_finish_num) xzzsbjs, sum(s.qtxzql_finish_num) qtxzqlbjs, sum(s.ggfw_finish_num) ggfwbjs
mapper.select:
select
from V_JC_TONGJI_ORG da left join (select
s.CITY_CODE,
s.COUNTY_CODE,
s.ORG_ID,
s.ORG_ID,
s.ORG_ID,
s.ORG_ID,
s.ORG_ID,
from
group by s.CITY_CODE
group by s.COUNTY_CODE
group by s.ORG_ID
group by s.ORG_ID
group by s.ORG_ID
group by s.ORG_ID
group by s.ORG_ID
) aa
on da.CITY_CODE = aa.CITY_CODE where 1=1 and da.p_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by da.ORDER_NUM
on da.COUNTY_CODE = aa.COUNTY_CODE where 1=1 and da.p_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by da.ORDER_NUM
on da.ORG_ID = aa.ORG_ID where 1=1 and da.COUNTY_CODE = #{countyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and da.ORG_LEVEL = '5' order by da.ORDER_NUM
on da.ORG_ID = aa.ORG_ID where 1=1 and da.COUNTY_CODE = #{countyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and da.ORG_LEVEL = '5' order by da.ORDER_NUM
on da.ORG_ID = aa.ORG_ID where 1=1 and da.ORG_ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by da.ORDER_NUM
on da.ORG_ID = aa.ORG_ID where 1=1 and da.p_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by da.ORDER_NUM
on da.ORG_ID = aa.ORG_ID where 1=1 and da.p_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by da.ORDER_NUM
select distinct(org_id)from v_jc_dghy_spxm
mapper.sql: t1.ORG_ID as org_id, t1.ORG_CODE as area_org_code, t1.ORG_NAME as area_org_name, nvl(sum(t2.superviseSegmentGreenNum), 0) as supervise_segment_green_num, nvl(sum(t2.superviseSegmentYelloNum), 0) as supervise_segment_yello_num, nvl(sum(t2.superviseSegmentRedNum), 0) as supervise_segment_red_num, nvl(sum(t2.cancelSegmentYellowNum), 0) as cancel_segment_yellow_num, nvl(sum(t2.cancelSegmentRedNum), 0) as cancel_segment_red_num
mapper.select:
select
from V_JC_TONGJI_ORG t1 left join (select
si.CITY_CODE as area_code,
si.COUNTY_CODE as area_code,
sum(si.supervise_segment_green_num) as superviseSegmentGreenNum, sum(si.supervise_segment_yello_num) as superviseSegmentYelloNum, sum(si.supervise_segment_red_num) as superviseSegmentRedNum, sum(si.cancel_segment_yellow_num) as cancelSegmentYellowNum, sum(si.cancel_segment_red_num) as cancelSegmentRedNum from ${table} si where 1 = 1
and si.is_investment_supervision = #{isInvestmentSupervision,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and si.is_investment_supervision <> '1'
and si.NOW_DATE >= #{beginDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and si.NOW_DATE <= #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
group by CITY_CODE) t2 on t1.CITY_CODE = t2.area_code
group by COUNTY_CODE) t2 on t1.COUNTY_CODE = t2.area_code
where 1 = 1 and t1.p_id = #{pId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by t1.ORG_ID,t1.ORG_NAME, t1.ORG_CODE, t1.ORDER_NUM order by t1.ORDER_NUM
